roleset.name: requires cash
roleset.note: COST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cost' based on survey of sentences in big corpus. (from cost.01-v predicate notes)
COST-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from cost.01-n)

example.name: with an extra modifier
example.text: The new Mips machine will cost $150,000 for a basic system.

example.name: price and commodity
example.text: The increase in minimum wage will cost many thousands of jobs.

example.name: all args
example.text: The service costs the caller 30 cents a minute
